title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When opening the Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values for the parameters are not being displayed.
EB: I expect the default values to be shown in the value box, allowing me to modify the specific parameter I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Preview the report
2. Click the Show Report Parameters button

Expected result: The default values should be displayed in the value box, allowing for easy modification of parameters
Actual result: All the values are empty in the Enter Parameters dialog, requiring input for all values instead of just the intended parameter.
